description: This file defines the GetSourceRouteRequest class, which is a request within a mock Zigbee core environment. It retrieves the source route by traversing device parent relationships and sending a response with the hops.

classes.name: GetSourceRouteRequest
classes.description: Represents a request to obtain the source route for a Zigbee device identified by EUI-64, including execution logic to gather hops and send a response.

methods.name: GetSourceRouteRequest
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the request with an ID and the device's EUI-64.

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Executes the request by traversing parent devices to build the source route and then sends the response.
